data.text:
Michael Jordan is a very famous American basketball player. Everyone has heard his name. He is a former professional player. Michael Jordan is the greatest basketball player at all times. His name is mentioned on the NBA website for the best player.

Table of Contents

Jordan is born on February 17, 1963, in New York. Michael Jordan Biography is really interesting and filled with facts that many of them donât know. So lets read further about his career, life, and family.

Michael Jordan Career :

Michael Jordan is a very famous American basketball player. Everyone has heard his name. He is a former professional player. Michael Jordan is the greatest basketball player at all times. His name is mentioned on the NBA website for the best player. Chicago Bulls selected the player after Houston Rockets. Youngest player Michael Jordan made 200 steals and 100 blocks in a single season being the first one to do and created the history in NBA. Jordan took retirement in 1999 but was the president of the Basketball Operations of the team Washington Wizards. In 2003 he appeared in the NBA game. On the other hand, he established his own motorcycle racing team named Michael Jordan Motorsports. He has e arned many gold medals in his career.

Michael Jordan Family :

Michael Jordan was born to James Jordan and Deloris Jordan. His name was Michael Jeffery Jordan. James served in the electrical heavy equipment industry, whereas her mother serves in the bank. There are four more children named James R Jordan, Larry Deolis, and Roslyn. They all serve lots of love and affection to their parents.

Michael Jordan Girlfriend / Wife:

Michael Jordan is a married man. He tied his knot with Jaunita Vanoy in September 1989. The couple is blessed with two sons named Jeffery and Marcus Jordan and a daughter Jasmine Jordan. Later they filled a divorce and was granted a divorce after many applications in December 2006 they were granted a divorce and got separated. Later Jordan married his girlfriend Yvette and is still married. They are happily married and with two children. There are no rumors about their divorce till yet.

Also read about, Edie Campbell and Anna Ewers
